body_html: To run the python tests use https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/.jenkins/caffe2/test.sh#L114 . Just use 'python' instead of '$PYTHON' and '$CAFFE2_PYPATH' should be <path to your python's site-packages>/caffe2 (to find this you can run https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/.jenkins/caffe2/test.sh#L48 , or you can look at https://caffe2.ai/docs/faq.html#null__how-do-python-installations-work and learn what site-packages are, or you can just omit those lines and ignore those tests yourself). Or you can run the specific tests that are failing with pytest (don't remember the syntax though).

Or you can run the specific tests that are failing with pytest (don't remember the syntax though).
body: To run the python tests use https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/.jenkins/caffe2/test.sh#L114 . Just use 'python' instead of '$PYTHON' and '$CAFFE2_PYPATH' should be <path to your python's site-packages>/caffe2 (to find this you can run https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/.jenkins/caffe2/test.sh#L48 , or you can look at https://caffe2.ai/docs/faq.html#null__how-do-python-installations-work and learn what site-packages are, or you can just omit those lines and ignore those tests yourself). Or you can run the specific tests that are failing with pytest (don't remember the syntax though).
